languages.text: Аристократы протектората и влиятельные гости собрались на приеме в честь наследни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры фон Валанциус. Светский раут — это политическое мероприятие, на котором заключаются союзы, потому Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано воспользоваться предоставляемыми им возможностями. О завершении приема необходимо уведомить церемониймейстера.

traits.locale_text: Аристократы торговой империи и влиятельные гости собрались на приеме в честь наследни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры фон Валанциус. Светский раут — это политическое мероприятие, на котором заключаются союзы, потому Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано воспользоваться предоставляемыми им возможностями.

languages.text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.
languages.original_text: Аристократы протектората и влиятельные гости собрались на приеме в честь наследни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры фон Валанциус. Светский раут — это политическое мероприятие, на котором заключаются союзы, потому Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано воспользоваться предоставляемыми им возможностями. О завершении приема необходимо уведомить церемониймейстера.

traits.locale_text: The nobles of the trade empire and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honor of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

The nobles of the trade empire and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honor of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

languages.text: 王朝众多贵族与尊贵的客人都参加了接待会，与西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继承人见面。像这样的社交场合，也同样是政治活动的场所。行商浪人必须抓住眼前的机会，建立属于{mf|他|她}自己的联盟。等接待会结束之后，行商浪人需要通知祭仪大师。
languages.original_text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

traits.locale_text: 王朝众多贵族与尊贵的客人都参加了接待会，与西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继承人见面。像这样的社交场合，也同样是政治活动的场所。行商浪人必须抓住眼前的机会，建立属于{mf|他|她}自己的联盟。等接待会结束之后，行商浪人需要通知祭仪大师。

languages.text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者を讃える式典に、保護領の貴族や有力な賓客が集まった。社交の場は同盟が築かれる政治的なイベントでもある。そのためにも、自由開拓者は与えられた機会を掴まなければならない。式典の責任者に式典の終了を通知しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

traits.locale_text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者を讃える式典に、保護領の貴族や有力な賓客が集まった。社交の場は同盟が築かれる政治的なイベントでもある。そのためにも、自由開拓者は与えられた機会を掴まなければならない。式典の責任者に式典の終了を通知しなければならない。

languages.text: Los nobles del protectorado y otros invitados influyentes se han reunido en una recepción en honor de{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de Theodora von Valancius. Este evento social es una reunión política en la que se forjarán alianzas, por lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presenten. Cuando la des por concluida, informa al maestro de ceremonias.
languages.original_text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

traits.locale_text: Los nobles del protectorado y otros invitados influyentes se han reunido en una recepción en honor de{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de Theodora von Valancius. Este evento social es una reunión política en la que se forjarán alianzas, por lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presenten. Cuando la des por concluida, informa al maestro de ceremonias.

languages.text: Die Adeligen des Protektorats und einflussreiche Gäste haben sich zu einem Empfang zu Ehren {mf|des Erben|der Erbin} von Theodora von Valancius eingefunden. Da dieses gesellschaftliche Ereignis eine politische Veranstaltung ist, bei der Allianzen geschmiedet werden, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Gelegenheiten ergreifen, die sich ihm bieten. Der Zeremonienmeister sollte über das Ende des Empfangs informiert werden.
languages.original_text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

traits.locale_text: Die Adeligen des Protektorats und einflussreiche Gäste haben sich zu einem Empfang zu Ehren {mf|des Erben|der Erbin} von Theodora von Valancius eingefunden. Da dieses gesellschaftliche Ereignis eine politische Veranstaltung ist, bei der Allianzen geschmiedet werden, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Gelegenheiten ergreifen, die sich ihm bieten. Der Zeremonienmeister sollte über das Ende des Empfangs informiert werden.

languages.text: Les nobles du protectorat et des invités influents ont été réunis lors d'une réception en l'honneur de l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora von Valancius. Cette rencontre est un événement politique lors duquel des alliances seront forgées. C'est pourquoi {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit saisir l'opportunité qui s'offre à {mf|lui|elle}. La maîtresse des cérémonies devrait être prévenue de la fin de la réception.
languages.original_text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

traits.locale_text: Les nobles du protectorat et des invités influents ont été réunis lors d'une réception en l'honneur de l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora von Valancius. Cette rencontre est un événement politique lors duquel des alliances seront forgées. C'est pourquoi {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit saisir l'opportunité qui s'offre à {mf|lui|elle}. La maîtresse des cérémonies devrait être prévenue de la fin de la réception.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius'un vârisi onuruna düzenlenen merasime, protektoranın soyluları ve nüfuz sahibi misafirler katılıyor. Bu kutlama, aynı zamanda ittifakların kurulabileceği bir politik etkinlik. Hür Tacir bu fırsatı tepmemeli. Tören sonlandırılacağı zaman teşrifatçıya bilgi verilmesi yeterli.
languages.original_text: The nobles of the protectorate and influential guests have gathered at a reception in honour of Theodora von Valancius's heir. The social occasion is a political event where alliances will be forged, which is why the Rogue Trader must seize the opportunities presented to {mf|him|her}. The master of ceremonies should be notified of the end of the reception.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius'un vârisi onuruna düzenlenen resepsiyon, protektoranın soyluları ve nüfuz sahibi misafirlerle dolu. Bu kutlama, ittifakların kurulabileceği bir politik etkinlik de aynı zamanda. Hür Tacir bu fırsatı tepmemeli. Resepsiyon sonlandırılacağı zaman teşrifatçıya bilgi verilmeli.
